price: 8. kaadu diggah nanu baaxô bagul bilak eneyyi ittam addunya gaba kalta waqdi burtay (baaxo kinnuk) cooxuk tu-elle aneewayta tet abna.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lajāʿilūna mā ʿalayhā ṣaʿīdan juruzan
